title_en: Transactional Records: Deaths due to COVID-19
title_ms: Rekod Transaksi: Kematian disebabkan oleh COVID-19
description_en: Transactional records of deaths due to COVID-19, with various demographic and medical dimensions including COVID-19 vaccination records. The preview shows the most recent 200 records.
description_ms: Rekod transaksi kematian disebabkan oleh COVID-19, dengan pelbagai dimensi demografi dan perubatan termasuk rekod vaksinasi COVID-19. Pratonton menunjukkan 200 rekod terkini.
methodology_en: This dataset is produced by the Crisis Preparedness and Response Centre (CPRC) at the Ministry of Health, based on daily ground-level surveillance conducted to monitor the evolution of COVID-19 in Malaysia. Following Malaysia's transition to endemicity, the public reporting frequency was altered from daily to weekly. Nevertheless, internal surveillance is still conducted on a daily basis.
methodology_ms: Dataset ini dihasilkan oleh Pusat Kesiapsiagaan dan Tindak Cepat Krisis (CPRC) di Kementerian Kesihatan Malaysia, berdasarkan survelan harian di lapangan yang dilaksanakan untuk memantau evolusi COVID-19 di Malaysia. Berikutan peralihan Malaysia kepada fasa endemik, kekerapan pelaporan awam telah diubah daripada harian kepada mingguan. Namun begitu, survelan harian masih berlangunsung secara dalaman.
caveat_en: As a general rule, deaths due to COVID-19 are not announced on the day that the death occurs. This is because it takes time to medically verify cause of death (via autopsy), as well as to register the death in accordance with the laws of Malaysia. Therefore, there may be future records where the date of death is prior to records already in the dataset. Phrased differently, aggregation based on the date of death will produce a dynamic dataset, where the number of deaths for a certain date may increase in future.
caveat_ms: Secara am, kematian disebabkan oleh COVID-19 tidak diumumkan pada tarikh kematian tersebut berlaku. Ini kerana ia memerlukan masa untuk mengesahkan sebab kematian (melalui bedah siasat), serta untuk mendaftarkan kematian tersebut selaras dengan undang-undang Malaysia. Oleh itu, terdapat kemungkinan di mana rekod yang dimasukkan pada masa depan mempunyai tarikh kematian sebelum rekod yang sudah ada dalam set data. Dalam erti kata lain, pengagretan berdasarkan tarikh kematian akan menghasilkan set data yang dinamik, di mana bilangan kematian pada sesuatu tarikh mungkin meningkat pada masa depan.
publication_en: KKMNOW features a [dashboard on COVID-19](https://data.moh.gov.my/dashboard/covid-19) where you can explore the data in a more interactive manner!
publication_ms: Portal KKMNOW memaparkan [papan pemuka tentang COVID-19](https://data.moh.gov.my/dashboard/covid-19) di mana anda boleh menerokai data ini dengan lebih interaktif!

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] Date on which the deceased was pronunced dead, in YYYY-MM-DD format
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh pada mana si mati disahkan meninggal dunia, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: date_announced
fields.description_en: [Date] Date on which the death was registered into the COVID-19 deaths database, in YYYY-MM-DD format
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh pada mana kematian tersebut dimasukkan ke pangkalan data kematian COVID-19, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: date_positive
fields.description_en: [Date] Date on which the deceased was confirmed to be COVID-19 positive, in YYYY-MM-DD format
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh pada mana si mati disahkan positif COVID-19, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: date_dose1
fields.description_en: [Date] Date of the deceased's first COVID-19 vaccination, if any, in YYYY-MM-DD format
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dos pertama vaksinasi COVID-19, sekiranya ada, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: date_dose2
fields.description_en: [Date] Date of the deceased's second COVID-19 vaccination, if any, in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field is intentionally nulled for individuals who received a single-dose COVID-19 vaccine such as Cansino.
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dos kedua vaksinasi COVID-19, sekiranya ada, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD. Medan ini dikosongkan bagi individu yang telah menerima vaksin COVID-19 dos tunggal seperti Cansino.

fields.name: date_dose3
fields.description_en: [Date] Date of the deceased's booster COVID-19 vaccination, if any, in YYYY-MM-DD format
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dos penggalak vaksinasi COVID-19, sekiranya ada, dalam format YYYY-MM-DD

fields.name: brand1
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Either Pfizer, Sinovac, AstraZeneca, Cansino, Sinopharm, or Moderna. Values of 'Pending VMS sync' reflect issues with retrieving the vaccine brand from the Malaysia Vaccine Administration System (MyVAS).
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada Pfizer, Sinovac, AstraZeneca, Cansino, Sinopharm, atau Moderna. Nilai 'Pending VMS sync' bermaksud terdapat masalah mendapatkan jenama vaksin daripada Sistem Pentadbiran Vaksin Malaysia (MyVAS).

fields.name: brand2
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Either Pfizer, Sinovac, AstraZeneca, Cansino, Sinopharm, or Moderna. Values of 'Pending VMS sync' reflect issues with retrieving the vaccine brand from the Malaysia Vaccine Administration System (MyVAS). This field is intentionally nulled for individuals who received a single-dose COVID-19 vaccine such as Cansino.
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada Pfizer, Sinovac, AstraZeneca, Cansino, Sinopharm, atau Moderna. Nilai 'Pending VMS sync' bermaksud terdapat masalah mendapatkan jenama vaksin daripada Sistem Pentadbiran Vaksin Malaysia (MyVAS). Medan ini dikosongkan bagi individu yang telah menerima vaksin COVID-19 dos tunggal seperti Cansino.

fields.name: brand3
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Either Pfizer, Sinovac, AstraZeneca, Cansino, Sinopharm, or Moderna. Values of 'Pending VMS sync' reflect issues with retrieving the vaccine brand from the Malaysia Vaccine Administration System (MyVAS).
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sama ada Pfizer, Sinovac, AstraZeneca, Cansino, Sinopharm, atau Moderna. Nilai 'Pending VMS sync' bermaksud terdapat masalah mendapatkan jenama vaksin daripada Sistem Pentadbiran Vaksin Malaysia (MyVAS).

fields.name: age
fields.description_en: [Integer] Age at the time of death, rounded to the nearest integer.
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Umur pada tarikh kematian, dibundarkan kepada integer terdekat.

fields.name: male
fields.description_en: [Integer] Binary variable indicating the deceased's sex, either male (1) or female (0)
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Pembolehubah binari bagi jantina si mati, sama ada lelaki (1) atau perempuan (0)

fields.name: bid
fields.description_en: [Integer] Binary variable indicating whether the deceased died in a hospital (0), or was brought in dead (1).
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Pembolehubah binari menunjukkan sama ada si mati telah meninggal dunia di hospital (0), ataupun sudah meninggal dunia sebelum dimasukkan ke hospital (1).

fields.name: malaysian
fields.description_en: [Integer] Binary variable indicating whether the deceased was Malaysian (1) or non-Malaysian (0)
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Pembolehubah binari menunjukkan sama ada si mati adalah warganegara Malaysia (1) atau bukan warganegara (0)

fields.name: comorb
fields.description_en: [Integer] Binary variable indicating whether the deceased had comorbidities (1) or was otherwise healthy (0).
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Pembolehubah binari menunjukkan sama ada si mati menghidapi lain-lain penyakit (1), ataupun sihat selain daripada dijangkiti COVID-19 (0).
